initResponse: I think we can arrange a transfer to your account that is respectful of your time and effort.
dialogDismayOptionName: Apologies, I can't commit to this venture at the moment.
responseAfter: As always Commander, thank you for assisting us. I look forward to our next meeting.

initResponse: Of course Commander, I believe we happen to have an account already prepared for such ventures. Follow me and we can negotiate the final terms.
dialogDismayOptionName: Actually, I think someone else can offer a better choice.
responseAfter: Thank you for choosing Tri Tachyon, goodbye Commander.

initResponse: Thank you for performing your duty Citizen. If you fill out the following forms I will make sure the correct compensation is awarded.
dialogDismayOptionName: Unfortunately I think I'll be holding onto these for now.
responseAfter: Thank you for your time Citizen. Remember to always come back to us.

initResponse: Of course Commander. The Admiral himself has informed us to make funds available should you have what we desire.
dialogDismayOptionName: Perhaps I'll hold onto them for now.
responseAfter: Safe travels Commander and may your aim be true.

initResponse: Follow me Pilgrim, lest the unpriviliged come to the wrong conclusions.
dialogDismayOptionName: On second thought, perhaps I might have need of these afterall.
responseAfter: May Ludd guide your step Commander.

initResponse: So the Heretic comes to us for forgiveness. Make it quick lest we come to a verdict.
dialogDismayOptionName: You know, I just remembered that I forgot to make observances at your wonderful shrine down the hallway.
responseAfter: Perhaps your soul can be saved Heretic, we will pray that you find absolvement before death.

initResponse: Thank you for waiting Commander. You have most definitely made the right decision to back our cause. This way and we can see about getting you fair compensation.
dialogDismayOptionName: Perhaps I'll consider my options for now. Thank you for your time.
responseAfter: I'm glad we were able to come to an arrangement Commander. Stay safe out there and until next time.

initResponse: So you came to barter for your life then? Better hope it's worth our time.
dialogDismayOptionName: I just remembered that my ship had an emergency and I best be going.
responseAfter: Perhaps you're worth keeping around after all. You'd best have a better offer for us next time.
